altText: a flask containing a pink solution
pText: Let's try heating the solution using a hot plate!

altText: a flask containing a pink solution sitting on a hot plate
pText: Press the power button to turn on the hot plate.

altText: a flask containing a clear solution sitting on a hot plate
pText: Wow! Heating it up turned the color of the solution from pink to clear! Don't forget to turn off the hot plate.

altText: a flask containing a clear solution
pText: Now lets wait for it the clear solution to cool off

altText: a flask containing a pink solution
pText: Woah, it turned pink again now that it's back to room temperature!
